Description: Qualifications and experience:*Previous sales experience, preferably in the financial services sector.- Excellent communication skills and ability to build sustainable relationships with clients.Ability to deal with sales challenges and achieve targets effectively.Good knowledge of the company's products and services and the ability to present them convincingly.*What we offer:*- A stimulating and professional work environment that gives you an opportunity to develop your skills and career path.- Competitive salaries and incentives in addition to rewarding commissions.- Opportunities for continuous training and development to develop your capabilities.- A harmonious and collaborative team that strives to achieve success together.Skills
Skills: Communication Skills: The sales executive must have excellent communication skills to interact effectively with customers and articulate products and services clearly. He must have the ability to listen and understand customer needs to provide appropriate solutions.

Knowledge of financial products: The sales officer must be familiar with the company's products and services in detail. Must be able to explain the features and benefits of these products to customers in a clear and engaging manner.

Negotiation Skills: Negotiation skills are an essential part of the role of a sales executive. He needs to be able to present attractive offers and deal with different types of clients and their requirements in a professional manner.

Working under pressure: A sales executive must be able to work effectively under pressure. This ability includes handling busy schedules, meeting sales targets, and dealing with unexpected challenges.

Data and Operations Analysis: The sales executive must have the ability to analyze financial data and understand the details of deals and transactions. Data analysis skills can help better direct efforts and make strategic decisions.
Consulting and Guidance: The sales executive must be able to provide financial advice to customers and guide them towards optimal financial options according to their needs.
Continuous learning: The field of financial services is constantly evolving, so the sales executive must be willing to continuously learn and follow the latest developments and trends in this field.

Interpersonal Relationships: A sales executive must have the ability to build and maintain strong professional relationships with customers, partners, and colleagues, which contributes to success in this role.
Initiative and self-motivation: The sales executive must be proactive and able to motivate himself to achieve and exceed goals. The desire to succeed and excel can be a powerful motivator.
These are just a sample of the skills a sales executive at a financial services company needs. Skills depend

Preferred.Nationality: Egypt; Hong Kong; Russian Federation; Ukraine
